title: Cinnamon pineapple with Malibu
ingredients: ['25 g (1 oz) glacé cherries, halved, rinsed and dried', '75 ml (2½ fl oz) Malibu, or other coconut-flavoured liqueur', '1.3 kg (3 lb) pineapple', '5 cm (2 in) cinnamon stick, halved', '2 star anise', '75 g (2¾ oz) dark brown sugar', '25 g (1 oz) seedless raisins', 'To garnish: sprigs of fresh mint']
